description: Eerection of lift core and staircase extension to central link, erection of bridge links and balconies over internal courtyard, installation of replacement windows and door and the internal reconfiguration of all floors, all in connection with the use of the buildings as four A1 retail units at ground and basement floor levels, B1 office on part first floor level and 26 residential units (net increase of 3 units) (comprising 11 x 1 bed flats and 15 x 2 bed flats) on the upper floor levels. Site includes 123 - 117 Long Acre.
